nodes.text: The Festival of the Wisties, also known as the Wistie Fest, was a favorite holiday celebrated by the Ewoks and the Wisties on the forest moon of Endor. The festival featured a Wistie Dance and the baking of Wistie Fest pie.

In preparation for one particular festival, Wicket Wystri Warrick and Princess Kneesaa a Jari Kintaka volunteered to help the shaman Logray prepare for the celebration. The two retrieved items such as fungus from a brillibab tree, a gwanda gourd, starchains, rainbow berries, and a feather from a lantern bird. At the celebration, Chief Chirpa proclaimed it to be the best Wistie Fest ever.
